title: Embedded Software Engineer
summary: Do you have a passion for invention and self-challenge? Do you thrive with pushing the limits of what’s considered feasible? As part of an elite RF transceiver team, you’ll be working on low-level embedded software development/verification and sophisticated infrastructure for developing groundbreaking embedded firmware that delivers more performance in our products than ever before. Join us and help us innovate new wireless systems technologies that continually outperform the previous iterations!
description: Responsible for design, implementation, bringup & verification of low-level embedded software, tools, infrastructure development and maintenance to aid robust firmware development and verification, in collaboration with firmware, virtual prototype, CAD, System validation, and other teams. Develop and maintain shell scripts and Python infrastructure and contribute to existing libraries for cellular verification Support firmware and system validation teams during pre & post-silicon bring-up. Set up, maintain, and improve repositories and quality gate continuous integration/deployment pre & post-integration pipelines.
key_qualifications: Working experience in low-level embedded software development, bringup, and verification for complex cellular transceiver sub-systems. Excellent command of C and C++, and working experience with compilers and build(Make/CMake) files. Proficient in Python and shell scripting. Experience in improving and maintaining the development and debug environments, tools, and methodologies on Linux/MacOS. Hands-on experience with branching strategies, code management tools like Git/GitLab/GitHub, and continuous integration and deployment tools like GitLab, Jenkins etc.. Have a good understanding and working experience with Splunk, REST Web Services, JSON, YAML, XML. Excellent problem-solving and analytical thinking skills. BS and 3+ years of relevant industry experience required.
education_experience: BS and 3+ years of relevant industry experience required BS/MS in Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or Computer Science preferred.
